mailSubject: Re: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32)
mailBody:
Dear Shubham,

Thank you for sharing the internal data to update the checklist. I have reviewed the details, and I've noted that there are several missing items concerning the company directorship, tax documentation, regulatory compliance, and PEP screening. Unfortunately, it appears that J.P. Morgan Securities PLC has not disclosed or plans to disclose information on these specific areas in their 2023 Annual Report.

If you require further assistance or if there's anything else I can help with, please feel free to let me know.

Best regards,
Surbhi Nagori
